/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ct.dao.CtFncMngBDao.selectCtFncMngB */
SELECT * FROM (
SELECT
TOP (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ${orderBy}N.CT_FNC_ID DESC) AS RNUM, N.* FROM (
SELECT
DISTINCT
CFMB_T.CT_FNC_ID, CFMB_T.CT_FNC_SUBJ_RESC_ID, CFMB_T.CT_FNC_TYP, CFMB_T.URL, CFMB_T.REL_TBL_SUBJ, CFMB_T.DFT_YN, CFMB_T.MUL_CHOI_YN, CFMB_T.USE_YN, CFMB_T.CT_MNG_YN, CFMB_T.PT_URL,
( SELECT RESC_VA FROM CT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = CFMB_T.CT_FNC_SUBJ_RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = #{langTyp, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) CT_FNC_NM, CFMB_T.COMP_ID,
FROM CT_FNC_MNG_B CFMB_T
INNER JOIN CT_FNC_D CFD_T on CFMB_T.CT_FNC_ID = CFD_T.CT_FNC_ID
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY CFMB_T.CT_FNC_ID
) N ) M WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND RNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
